hero.title:
Are you imagining a
technological challenge?

about.title: About Hire a Coop
about.item1Text:
Hire a COOP is a campaign designed to promote responsible consumption of services and products from self-managed organizations.

Hiring a cooperative aligns with the Sustainable Development Goals, fostering decent work, economic redistribution,gender equality and sustainable development.

The year 2025 has been declared the International Year of Cooperatives for the United Nations in recognition of their social role in building a better world.

We invite universities, civil associations, non-profit organizations and any company that wants to align their resources with their values.

We can contribute to changing the world with each of out actions.
about.item2Text:
At the Argentine Federation of Technology, Innovation, and Knowledge Work Cooperatives (FACTTIC), we are more than 40 technology cooperatives that develop high-quality technology while ensuring fair and inclusive work and data privacy.

Cooperative means innovation, fairness, and high-quality services.

We know that incorporating technology is a big decision, which is why we support you from the very beginning to build the most powerful and suitable solution for your needs.

No project is too small or too big when we work together.

Count on a co-op for your technological challenges!

hire.title2: Cooperatives are the best alternative to bring our resources to our ideas!

aboutWOIP.title: About
aboutWOIP.item1Text:
The research explores the contours of worker-owned digital platforms from an intersectional perspective to envision a more sustainable labor future for workers.

Adopting a research-action approach, the project involves delivery and technology workers in Brazil and Argentina.

What distinguishes this research project is the use of intersectionality, which integrates queer, feminist, racial, class, and decolonial perspectives as multiple forms of labor oppression.

Funded by the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council (SSHRC) through an Insight Development Grant (IDG).

cooperativism.title: Worker-owned platforms involve:
cooperativism.item1Text: The working class creating their own technologies

contactForm.values: Equity and diversity are fundamental to our core beliefs and values. We encourage your organization to hire cooperatives for your digital needs. Thus, you obtain quality while fostering a fairer and more sustainable future in the workforce.
